title: Authors and Citation

code: @Manual{,   title = {gdrive.automation: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)},   author = {Hao Ye},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000}, }

what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: goal gdrive-automation automate processing tasks related C4R Shared Drive, aid synchronization states content. Specific actions include: * check updates Unit Roadmaps process accordingly (send notifications, update files) * check updates Unit Tracking spreadsheet process accordingly (send notifications, update files)

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Data Unit Status shared across two distinct files: * Unit Roadmap (“roadmap”) specific unit - google doc * overall Unit Tracking spreadsheet (“tracker”) - google sheet data unique roadmap : * metadata unit (title, description, mini-units, activities)

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: roadmap tracker contain status indicators various components / phases unit. (technical limitation embedding google doc interactive interface data stored elsewhere.) 4 states status, generally progresses : “started” -> “Submitted” -> “review” -> “Approved” documentation clarifies resolve situations status particular item different roadmap vs. tracker.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)

what: Case 1. Tracker is “further along” than the Roadmap
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)

previous_headings: Resolving Status Updates > Case 2. Roadmap is “further along” than the Tracker
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Update tracker match. Send notifications necessary. Log change.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: (change item METER review) 1. Update tracker match. 2. Send notifications necessary. 3. Log change.

previous_headings: Resolving Status Updates > Case 2. Roadmap is “further along” than the Tracker
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Revert roadmap match tracker. Notify Hao discrepancy. Log change.
